mapper.sql: id, type, onlineseats_id, userName, idNumber, area, latitude, longitude, address, wechat_id, phone, alarm_time
mapper.insert:

id,
type,
onlineseats_id,
userName,
idNumber,
area,
latitude,
longitude,
address,
wechat_id,
phone,
alarm_time,

mapper.update:
update videoalarm_errorinfo
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
onlineseats_id = #{onlineseatsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idNumber = #{idnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wechat_id = #{wechatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
alarm_time = #{alarmTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update videoalarm_errorinfo set type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, onlineseats_id = #{onlineseatsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, idNumber = #{idnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat_id = #{wechatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, alarm_time = #{alarmTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select tp.date,
max(case dictName when '1' then dictValue else '0' end ) '1',
max(case dictName
when '2' then dictValue else '0' end ) '2'
from ( select DATE_FORMAT(alarm_time,'%Y-%m-%d') date,type dictName,count(*) dictValue from videoalarm_errorinfo c where 1=1
and c.alarm_time >= #{startDate}
and c.alarm_time < #{endDate}
group by DATE_FORMAT(alarm_time,'%Y-%m-%d'),type ) tp group by tp.date

select
from videoalarm_errorinfo c
where 1=1
and c.id = #{id}
and c.type like concat ('%', #{type},'%')
and c.onlineseats_id like concat ('%', #{onlineseatsId},'%')
